YorkRegression¶

class isopy.toolbox.misc.YorkRegression(slope, slope_error, intercept, intercept_error, sumW, xbar)[source]¶

Returned by york_regression().

This object contains all the necessary attributes to calculate the value and uncertainty of y for any given value of x.

slope¶

The best fit slope of the regression

Type

float

slope_error¶

The uncertainty of the slope

Type

float

intercept¶

The y axis intercept of the regression

Type

float

intercept_error¶

The uncertainty of the y axis intercept

Type

float

sumW¶

Sum of the weights

Type

float

xbar¶

The weighted x mean.

Type

float

See also

york_regression(), plot_york_regression()

y_error(x)[source]¶

Return the uncertainty of y at x.

y(x)[source]¶

Return y at x.
